author: senh
title: In Transit: London Gets in the Halloween Spirit
text: BING NEWS: Britain marks 10th anniversary of London transit attacks LONDON -- Britons paused in silence and walked in solidarity Tuesday to mark the 10th anniversary of suicide bomb attacks on London's transit system.
